meanings.definition: The surgical procedure to reshape the outer ear.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed otoplasties on the patient's ears.
meanings.sent2: Otoplasties can help improve the appearance of the ears.
meanings.sent3: During the otoplasties, the ears got a stylish makeover.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared after the successful otoplasties.
meanings.sent5: The before and after photos of the otoplasties were remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The clinic specializes in various otoplasties.
meanings.sent2: She had multiple otoplasties to correct her ears.
meanings.sent3: The otoplasties in the display looked like a collection of art.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with stories of successful otoplasties.
meanings.sent5: The otoplasties in the brochure showcased different ear shapes.
